Strings.String:
Cloak and sneak behind your target to unleash a vicious sword attack.
Receives damage bonuses from sword upgrades. Considered a melee attack.
Increase the duration of freeze effects by {Evolve_DurationBonus%p}%. Decrease the movement speed of chilled targets by an additional {Evolve_SpeedReductionBonus%p}%.
Increase damage by {Evolve_Damage2%p}%. Weaken armored targets by an additional {Evolve_ArmorReductionBonus%p}%.
Increase the damage of tech combos by {Evolve_ComboBonus%p}%.

Turn into a powerful turret with the T5-V Battlesuit.
Increase weapon damage, rate of fire, and magazine size. Slows movement speed. Stays active until disabled.
Reduce the delay before shields start regenerating by {Evolve_ShieldRegenBonus%p}%.
Increase weapon accuracy bonus by {Evolve_WeaponAccuracyBonus%p}% while active.
Devastator Mode already active. Use it again to deactivate.

The N7 Shield Guardian obliterates a swath of enemies with explosives while using tech abilities and a heavy omni-shield to stay intact.
More power damage. More weapon damage. More strength.
Reduce all damage taken by {Evolve_DamageTakenBonus%p}% for {Evolve_DamageTakenDuration} seconds after decloaking.

Hit your opponent with an electrical attack that does {Evolve_DoTDamagePercent%p}% additional damage over {Evolve_DoTDamageDuration} seconds.
Detonate this effect with other powers.
Strike shields or barriers to drain their energy to refill your shields. Increase movement speed by {Evolve_MovementSpeedBonus%p}% for {Evolve_MovementSpeedDuration} seconds after decloaking.
Increase the damage the omni-shield withstands before collapsing by {Evolve_ShieldDurability%p}%.

Add a flame effect to your omni-shield. Your shield melees will burn enemies and are highly effective against armor.
Adds a fire effect to impacted targets that does {Evolve_FireDamage%p}% additional damage over {Evolve_FireDuration} seconds.

Add a freezing effect to your omni-shield that can chill or freeze enemies.
Snap freeze unprotected enemies. Slow shielded and armored targets by {Evolve_SpeedReduction%p}%. Weaken enemy armor by {Evolve_ArmorReduction%p}% for {Evolve_CryoDuration} seconds.
Increase missile damage and force by {Evolve_DamageBonus%p}%.
Increase effectiveness against armored targets by {Evolve_ArmorDamagePct%p}%.

Upgrade missile housing to fire {Evolve_NumExtraMultiMissile} extra seeking projectiles.
Decreases the payload of each missile by {Evolve_DamageReduction%p}%
Upgrade missile munitions to increase damage and force by {Evolve_DamageBonus2%p}%. Increase impact radius by {Evolve_ImpactRadiusBonus%p}%.
Launch multiple frag grenades by upgrading the T5-V's right gauntlet.

Upgrade the cutting-edge T5-V Battlesuit.
More power damage. More weapon damage. More strength.
Upgrade the T5-V's internal systems to boost health, shields, melee damage, and durability.
Increase damage by {Evolve_DamageBonus3%p}%. Increase force by {Evolve_ForceBonus3%p}%.
Light pistol that excels at destroying barriers and shields.

Designed for the asari resistance, the Acolyte's barrels fire advanced ammunition similar to that of an impact-triggered resonant warp bomb, which has a devastating effect on shields and biotic barriers. The specialized nature of the warp field means it does not pierce armor as effectively, but the shooter's biotics are expected to make up for this shortcoming.
Light machine gun with face shield. Recoil lowers if fired from cover.

The Typhoon is a distinctive light machine gun featuring a face shield to protect the shooter from headshots. Its power and recoil are so notorious that it includes a high-tech kinetic reducer to fight muzzle climb. Since the reducer tries to limit all motion by the weapon, marksmen do not engage it while moving and instead reduce the recoil only while they are in cover.

The N7 Piranha is an assault shotgun designed for the Reaper war. When the N7 program began training alien resistance forces, the lighter-bodied species wanted a low-recoil weapon with a wide pellet spread for dealing with hordes of husks. The result was the Piranha, which hit a sweet spot in close-range firepower. Its rapid-fire capability tears apart not only husks, but most opponents unlucky enough to be in its way.
Focus the energy of your barrier to fire a high-powered beam at a target from afar.
Knock weaker enemies to the ground.
Reduce the amount of barriers drained by {Evolve_BarrierReductionBonus%p}%.

Deploy an immobile pylon that supplies ammo and grenades. A built-in tech generator also increases maximum shields for nearby allies.
Only one pylon can be active at a time.
Increase the rate of ammunition generation by {TimeBetweenAmmoResupply%b}%. Increase the rate of grenade generation by {TimeBetweenGrenadeResupply%b}%.
Increase the rate of ammunition generation by {Evolve_AmmoSupplyFrequencyBonus%p}%. Increase the rate of grenade generation by {Evolve_GrenadeSupplyFrequencyBonus%p}%.
Increase the radius in which the pylon gives bonuses to allies by {Evolve_BuffRadiusBonus%p}%.
Upgrade the tech generator to also increase allied weapon damage by {Evolve_WeaponDamageBonus%p}%.
Upgrade the tech generator to also increase allied power damage by {Evolve_PowerDamageBonus%p}%.
Increase the number of grenades generated by {Evolve_NumExtraGrenades}.
Increase max shields by an additional {Evolve_MaxShieldsBonus%p}%.
The Destroyer's T5-V Battlesuit gives these strong-but-slow soldiers mech-like protection. Driven by eezo-assisted actuators, these frontline troopers carry heavy weapons onto the battlefield.

The Paladin carries a powerful omni-shield onto the battlefield to block enemy fire. The Paladin also uses the shield as a heavy-melee weapon that, when modified with incendiary or cryo upgrades, creates a devastating combination attack.

The Demolisher uses grenades to attack at range and to terrorize the battlefield. Demolishers can also create a supply pylon that stocks allies with an unending reserve of grenades and thermal reloads.
Shadow infiltrators use implants to dramatically improve agility, making them slippery combatants on the battlefield. Their monomolecular blades are a menace from cover and close range.
Slayers use implants to dramatically improve mobility. Their dizzying sword attacks can hit multiple opponents, and the Slayer’s ability to slip fire makes them hard to pin down on the battlefield.

Fury operatives use implants to fuel biotics and their incredible movement speed. These operatives wind an unpredictable path on the battlefield, moving in and out of combat before returning to unleash a sweeping biotic attack on their unsuspecting targets.

$745319
Firing the beam consumes {BarrierDrained%p}% of max barrier.
Charge your sword with biotic energy and slash nearby enemies in a wide swath, flattening unshielded opponents.
Spin this fiery effect around you to burn nearby enemies. When active, the field can be recast to blast a short-range area and to detonate combos.
Targets caught in the field take {Evolve_DamageTakenBonus%p}% additional damage from all sources.
Increase movement speed by {Evolve_MovementSpeedBonus%p}% while active.
Increase duration by {Evolve_DurationBonus%p}%. Drain {ShieldDrainConversion%p}% of the damage done to enemy shields/barriers to restore your own shields.
The enemy has one of our recon drones. Get it back and online.
A recon drone with enemy fleet intel went to ground in this area.
We've got a drone on the ground that scanned enemy tech. Secure it and upload its contents.
One of our agents didn't make it out. He dropped off his intel in a drone. Get it uploading.
They've got one of our drones. We need its contents uploaded before the enemy cracks its encryption.
We've got a drone downed in the area. It's got troop position data. Make it upload, stat.
We've got a ship down on the surface. A drone is the only thing that survived the crash. Get it online.
We've got a spy drone down. Cover it and get it to an upload location.
An N7 job went bad, but their drone survived. Recover its data and get out of there.
A drone went dark here. Recover its data before the enemy gets a crack at it.
That drone needs a friendly to activate it.
Stay focused and get to that drone.
Good work. Stay close so your omni-tool keeps it live.
Nice. Keep close or the drone will go dark again.
It's tagged you as friendly. Stay close to keep it moving.
Drone is live. Stay close to escort it.
First objective down. Now keep close to the drone.
You're out of range, stay close.
Drone went dark. It needs a friendly by it.
Stick close to that drone. It shuts down defensively.
The drone lost connection. Get back to it.
The drone is down. Get close again.
You need to stay close to that drone or it goes nowhere.
That drone doesn't move without you, soldier.
The drone is the mission. Get back to it.
Get a friendly to that drone, soldier!
If that drone doesn't get moving, this mission is toast.
Keep at it, you're close to the upload site.
Nearing the upload site. Keep that path open!
They're trying to hack the drone wirelessly. Get it there, now!
Time's up, people! Make it happen!
If it ain't now, it ain't never!
Checking upload... it's good. Nice one.
We've got a winner. Good one, team.
Data received in full. Good work.
We're DOA here. Prep for evac.
No good. We're done here. Prep for evac.
Abort. Let's get you outta there.

Unleash a wave of electrical energy from your sword to stun and damage all enemies in a cone.
Highly effective against shields/barriers. Considered a power attack. Receives damage bonuses from power upgrades.
Install a variety of omni-tool upgrades to enhance the potency of tech attacks. Tech Power Damage +<CUSTOM0>%
Use an advanced biotic amp to increase the strength of damaging biotic powers. Biotic Power Damage +<CUSTOM0>%
Add compartments to the user's armor to increase the capacity for thermal clips without sacrificing armor integrity. Thermal Clip Capacity +<CUSTOM0>%
Use an ammo shaver to load weapons with specially treated ammo blocks to fire heavier, harder ammunition that inflicts more damage per shot. Weapon Damage +<CUSTOM0>%
Increase the lethality of the sniper rifle and SMG. Sniper Rifle Damage +<CUSTOM0>% SMG Damage +<CUSTOM1>%
Increase the lethality of the assault rifle and pistol. Assault Rifle Damage +<CUSTOM0>% Pistol Damage +<CUSTOM0>%
Increase the lethality of the shotgun, and increase grenade storage. Shotgun Damage +<CUSTOM0>% Max Grenades +<CUSTOM3>
Boost the effectiveness of all weapons by increasing stability and thermal clip capacities. Weapon Stability +<CUSTOM0>% Thermal Clip Capacity +<CUSTOM1>%
Use high-capacity kinetic barrier generators to provide bonuses to both shield strength and melee damage. Shield Strength +<CUSTOM0>% Melee Damage +<CUSTOM1>%
Use an advanced biotic amp to increase the strength of biotic attacks, including melee damage. Biotic Damage +<CUSTOM0>% Melee Damage +<CUSTOM1>%
Provide more power to tech abilities to decrease recharge time. Tech Damage +<CUSTOM0>% Power Recharge Speed +<CUSTOM1>%
Apply level <CUSTOM1> polonium rounds for one mission to add a damage-over-time effect to enemies you shoot.
Apply level <CUSTOM1> hammerhead rounds for one mission to increase your ammunition's force of impact.
Apply level <CUSTOM1> explosive rounds for one mission. Fire on an opponent continuously to build up the charge and then cease fire to detonate it.
Apply level <CUSTOM1> phasic rounds for one mission to break through enemy shields, increasing damage.
Apply level <CUSTOM1> rail rounds for one mission, allowing ammunition to pass great distances through cover and other objects.
Increase force and damage of biotic detonations by {Evolve_ComboBonus%p}%.
Increase force and damage of tech detonations by {Evolve_ComboBonus%p}%.
Increase power damage and force bonuses by {Evolve_PowerDamageBonus1%p}%. Increase grenade capacity by {Evolve_GrenadeBonus}.
Increase power damage and force bonuses by {Evolve_PowerDamageBonus3%p}%.

These soldiers are the go-anywhere, fight-anything special forces of the Alliance that were trained at the Interplanetary Combatives Academy in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. They had to survive combat situations "in an admirable and effective fashion" to receive the N7 rank. Many N7s now train other species in anti-Reaper asymmetric warfare.
Launch this seeking grenade to track down a target, causing a massive explosion on impact.
Add a fire effect to targets, dealing {Evolve_DoTDamage%p}% additional damage over {Evolve_DoTDuration} seconds.
Increase damage to armor by {Evolve_ArmorDamageBonus%p}%. Decrease weapon damage mitigation of armored targets by {Evolve_ArmorDebuffPercent%p}% for {Evolve_ArmorDebuffDuration} seconds.
Split a grenade in half to seek two targets that do {Evolve_SplitDamage%p}% damage each.
Increase weapon mass for a split second per shot by using an expert timing-VI to reduce weapon kick and improve aim.
Superior kinetic coils increase shot penetration.
Attach an omni-blade to the weapon for increased melee damage.
Increase headshot lethality by balancing barrel calibration so that ammunition pierces bone and explodes in soft tissue.
Superior lightweight alloys replace weapon parts, making the weapon less obtrusive and easier to handle.
Reveal enemies through walls and smoke with a 4x optical scope and enhance stability and accuracy while zoomed.

Combat skills are perfected to an art with N7 training.
More power damage. More weapon damage.
Increase sword damage by {Evolve_MeleeSpreeBonus%p}% for {Evolve_MeleeSpreeDuration} seconds after an enemy is killed by a sword attack.
Decrease shield-recharge delay by {Evolve_ShieldRegenBonus%p}%. Increase movement speed by {Evolve_MovementSpeedBonus%p}%.
Increase sword damage to shields/barrier by {Evolve_ShieldDamageBonus%p}%.
Increase sword damage to armor by {Evolve_ArmorDamageBonus%p}%.
Increase weapon damage bonus by {Evolve_WeaponDamageBonus2%p}%. Increase grenade capacity by {Evolve_GrenadeBonus2}.
Boost health, shields, melee damage, durability, and movement speed.
$755984 Decreases max shields by {ShieldPercentPenalty%p}% while active.
Increase the number of grenades launched by {AdditionalChildPieces}.

Rip a target into shreds with the T5-V's autofiring shoulder cannon.
Lock onto a target to launch a stinger missile. Stays active until disabled.

Flash-freeze unprotected enemies and slow down the rest with a wave of ice damage.
Frozen targets don't regenerate health.
Stun and electrocute your enemies with an EMP-packed grenade. Effective against shields and barriers.
Add an electrical effect that does {Evolve_DoTDamage%p}% additional damage over {Evolve_DoTDuration} seconds.
Increase damage to shields and barriers by {Evolve_ShieldDamageBonus%p}%.
The Reapers hit us first, and they hit without warning.
While the rest of the galaxy gathers strength to fight a final battle...
To keep what's left of Earth free.
This is it - today - all the training... all the sacrifices. This is why you do this.
You are the elite. You are the future of Earth.
The fleets are gathering, but until they come back... we're on our own.
The Reapers attacked Earth because they knew we were a threat.
But they don't know the half of it.
They'll have to go through us to get it!
[Transition to Call to Arms for the men fighting on earth]
